title: Plat Midlaner LFT (competitive)

embed.description: Kaze no Katana / Platinum 1 20LP / 144W 139L Win Ratio 51% / Yasuo - 45W 35L Win Ratio 56%, Aatrox - 12W 18L Win Ratio 40%, Sylas - 14W 10L Win Ratio 58%, Vladimir - 14W 9L Win Ratio 61%, Azir - 11W 8L Win Ratio 58%

body:
Hello everyone,

I am looking for a low diamond/plat team to play tournaments/ summonersinnleague with. Don't be scared by what I play in SoloQ I'm open to play whatever champions are nescessary for us to suceed, I just like to have a little fun in soloQ.

I'm 22 years old and from Germany. I play League since season 2. I'm a calm and collected player with vast game knowledge and able to play all mid champions. I've been on several teams and tournaments before but all on the smaller side. TS and Discord available. I like to play aggressive in mid and push advantages/ look for roams and invades. My biggest weakness is tunnel vision/ not knowing where the jungler is currently.

IGN: Kaze no Katana
Serious Inquiries only!
Hope to hear from you guys soon!
